description.jp:
バラムガーデンの風紀委員で 言葉を
極端に省略した口調が特徴。
サイファーの決断には無条件で従うほど
に心酔しているが 魔女の手先として変
わっていく彼を内心では憂慮している。
とても気が強く 年上の雷神を完全に
尻に敷いてしまうほど。
description.gl: A member of Balamb Garden's disciplinary committee known for her extraordinarily brusque manner of speaking. Devoted enough to Seifer that she normally follows him unquestioningly、 his changes since becoming a sorceress's minion cause her concern. Despite being the junior of the pair、 her strong will has Raijin thoroughly whipped.

jp.text: 原因不明困惑（げんいんふめい こんわく）
全部肯定！（ぜんぶこうてい！）
泣言禁止！（なきごときんし！）
あんたは……いつまでも仲間だよ

gl.text: We are. We always will be.

desc.en:
「Metsu」 use +2

When using 「Metsu」, 「Metsu+」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4 
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Triggers an AoE HP attack after use
- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
- Slightly improves 「Speed Up」
- Grants 「Silent Wind」 for 6 turns
- Lowers Action Delay.

When using 「Metsu」:
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When using 「Metsu+」:
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

「Silent Wind」 has the following party effects:
- Raises Attack
- Grants 「Enchant Wind」
- Grants 「BRV Regen」

Metsu use +2

When using Metsu, Metsu+: 
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Triggers additional group HP attack after use; deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Slightly boosts SPD Up
 • Self: 6 turns Silent Wind
 • Turn rate+
 
When using Metsu: 
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 
When using Metsu+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
